title: Ticket #3063: JobRouter should apply limits per-submitter
description:
The JobRouter currently provides very useful limits on the total number of jobs and idle jobs per route.

I'd like to see these limits extended to be applied per-user. This is useful in the context of the Condor-CE. On the OSG, we occasionally see one submitter dump a huge number of jobs (by bug or on purpose) on a CE.

We would like to limit the impact of such a case on the batch system while retaining the other users' ability to submit.
